lines.text: [first lines]
[Peter gives a cap for a sunscreen bottle to Sandra]
Lose something?

[takes the bottle cap]
Get lost.
Hey, take it easy on me.
Beat it!
I can take a hint. I just thought I'd like to sell you a little insurance.

[scoffs]
Now I've heard everything. Get lost.

[as he walks away]
Hey, just thought I'd give it a try. It never hurts to try.
Hey, wait a minute. Come back here. Have a seat.
[Peter walks back and sits down beside Sandra]
You salesmen are all alike. Your timing's wrong. Slow down. Don't you know there's a speed limit on this island? 55 miles per hour.
And how fast would you say I was going?
100 miles per hour!
Why don't you pull me over and give me a ticket?

Here's the check for your husband's life insurance. I'm gonna hand it to you. Don't look at it, just put it in your purse. And don't put it in your safety deposit box until I tell you to. You understand?
Yes, okay, okay. But Peter, I'm nervous.
"The sting of the bumblebee is deadly. But it's the charm of the bumblebee that'll kill you". Lots of help, huh?
Not much.
[after strangling Sandra's husband]
Is he dead?
Oh, he's dead as he'll ever be!
We did it! Do you love me?
What do you think?
I don't know.
Well, get in the car and into the back seat, and I'll prove it.
